attributes.action: Stop selling arms and weaponry to Saudi Arabia.
attributes.additional_details: * once we leave the EU Germany will get there European army they want to push power once more, Saudi Arabia will have more than enough jets and weaponry to act as they want (more than likely concurring) and the UK will be licking the boots of anyone who threatens us because we are selling everything and not investing enough in our ministry of defence.
attributes.background: We need to start thinking of whats going to come in the future, this "World peace" is just not reality weather you choose to see it or not. The more of our wepons and technology we sell the less "powerful" we are to protect ourselves in the future. We need to stop selling our wepons and technology
